title: Question about bathroom commode
selftext: Constructing a house and Commodes have to be installed. I liked rectangular commode but I don't know if it will be comfortable for sitting, mainly for my parents. The shape will be like this : [https://imgur.com/a/AnaawCH](https://imgur.com/a/AnaawCH). Those who had this rectangular shaped commode, Is it comfortable or should I go for regular oval or round shaped one ?
comments: OP, I used to work in this industry. Square WCs are no problem. Go ahead. Dm me more for details if needed
In my experience, all the shapes are fine. We have an oval one and square one at home.

Not uncomfortable for me. Comfort for me is more on the WC size (length) rather than shape. 

I personally prefer the oval one at home, mainly because it is larger and not because of the shape. But have used larger square/rectangular ones in the past without issues.

More than the shape, focus on the size to allow legs to stretch properly.

And length. Especially length.

I hate the modern tiny ones where your you know what just lies on the front part of the commode.
